author: Paul "Redeye" Chaloner
quote: It's not about how good you are, it's about how good you want to be.

author: Steve Jobs
quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: Winning isn't everything, but wanting to win is.

author: Abraham Lincoln
quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.

author: Ted Turner
quote: Life is a game. Money is how we keep score.

author: Robert Kiyosaki
quote: The world is a game. Money is how we keep score. The game is constantly changing. So must we.

author: Michael Jordan
quote: The game has its ups and downs, but you can never lose focus of your individual goals and you can't let yourself be beaten because of lack of effort.

author: Shigeru Miyamoto
quote: Video games are bad for you? That's what they said about rock-n-roll.

author: Marvin Phillips
quote: The difference between try and triumph is just a little umph!
